mapper.select: SELECT email, password, is_verified AS isVerified FROM facediary_db.user WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT email, password, is_verified AS isVerified FROM facediary_db.user WHERE verify_token = #{token}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO facediary_db.user(email, password, verify_token) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{token})
mapper.update: UPDATE facediary_db.user SET is_verified = true WHERE email = #{email} and verify_token = #{token}
